attributes.action: Allow Private Members Clubs to smoke in their own premises in designated rooms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Social Clubs in Great Britain have been here for over 100 years.We choose our membership within the ethos of the CIU.We should not be dictated to by outside forces.Closure of many Private Clubs WILL HAPPEN,membership will fall putting thousands out of work.Social Clubs are a safety net for families for social interaction with their peers and children to learn from being within the club family; a tradition that will no doubt carry on.We feel we are loosing our identity in OUR COUNTRY Forcing people out of buildings and onto the streets may only increase passive smoking.If they are in a designated smoking room akin to that afforded Crown Properties; the risk must be less and it would be properly controlled.
Our lives, in our own time are being dictated to.Please treat us as Adults and let us run our own clubs the way we see fit. If Crown Properties are exempt,why can we not have the same. PLEASE VOTE TO HAVE PRIVATE MEMBERS CLUBS EXEMPT FROM THIS BILL
